page.title: 15Beacon Kennels - Paignton
page.content: The kennels are on Beacon Hill because it is very quiet and away from other housing.The only animals that are accepted are cats and dogs. Some people put their cats and dogs in kennels because they are going away. The pets have to have injections before they come into the kennels so that they do not spread diseases. The maximum number of animals accepted in Beacon Kennels are 30 dogs and 20 cats. When we went we counted 21 dogs and 17 cats. There were lots of different kinds of dogs and cats. There was one black cat that was 20 years old. The busiest times of the year are June and July. The cats and dogs are fed a set menu chosen by the owners. At 6a.m. the owner would feed and stay with the cats then at 7a.m. do the same with the dogs.
